name: Fit Levin Training
description: A relible tool that Personal Trainers can use for organizing, updating & creating clients. Clients can log in as well to view         their personal goals, history, fitness plan & any notes their trainer has given them about their last session.
technologies: Technologies used: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Sequelize, Heroku and Materialize framework.

name: The Covid-19 Relief Initiative
description: Find local medical and health charities to aid in the fight against Covid-19! You can also get current Covid-19 stats for each state.
technologies: Technologies used: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery; Foundations framework; Covid-19 Monitor Pro and Charity Navigator's APIs.

name: Eat-Da-Burger
description: A restaurant app that lets users input the names of burgers they'd like to eat.
technologies: Technologies used: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery; SQL, Heroku,NodeJS, MySQL, Express, Handlebars,Bootstrap framework.

name: Employee CMS
description: An application which allows you to view and manage the departments, roles, and employees in a company.
technologies: Technologies used: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery; Node, MySQL.

name: Note Taker
description: Never forget important information again! Quickly make notes of information that you need to review or remember. Dates, passwords, activities etc!
technologies: Technologies used: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Express.js, UUID and Heroku.

name: Google Books Search
description: React-based Google Books Search app. User can search for books via the Google Books API, save it &/or view it on Google Books.
technologies: Technologies used: React, JavaScript, Node, Express, Mongo, GoogleBooks API.
